name: EyeExam
0:
”Alexa, open Eye Exam”
”Alexa, start Eye Exam”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eye exam
des:
Eye Exam allows you to measure your visual acuity on Echo Show or Echo Spot. The test consists of a series of Landolt rings (incomplete circles) and telling Alexa the location of each ring's opening. With this information, the Skill can estimate your quality of eyesight and whether you likely need glasses or whether your current eyeglass prescription has changed. 

When speaking the location of the ring openings, you can name the direction (top, left, right, bottom, bottom-right, bottom-left, top-right or top-left) or the cardinal point (north, south, west, east, north-west, north-east, south-west, south-east).

Note: This skill does not guarantee accurate results and is not an alternative to a medical examination by a professional optician.

The test requires about 5 minutes of time and 2 meters (about 6.5 feet) between you and your Echo Show or Echo Spot.

Please take a moment to leave a review if you find Eye Exam useful, or send us feedback via e-mail to info@169labs.com.

Pictures by shutterstock.com

This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency phone number.
